content:
/>
XI.ii.1.1.a
.
General Responsibilities of a Claims Processor
A claims processor must review the evidence of record to determine if a claim for survivors benefits
should be submitted to the rating activity, or
can be decided without a rating decision.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 1  - Referral for Consideration of Survivor's Benefits
citation: Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section None
